titles.title: A resolution commending the purpose and organizers of the art exhibit, "An American Vision: Three Generations of Wyeth Art", scheduled to open in the Soviet Union in March of 1987.

action.text: Submitted in the Senate. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. 21.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Commends the organizers of the traveling art exhibit "An American Vision: Three Generations of Wyeth Art," as well as the exhibit itself.
